Package mulan.classifier.transformation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdaBoostMH
    Implementation of the AdaBoost.MH algorithm based on Weka's AdaBoostM1.
    BinaryAndPairwise
    An algorithm that trains both binary and pairwise models.
    BinaryRelevance
    Algorithm that builds one binary model per label.
    CalibratedLabelRanking
    Implementation of the Calibrated Label Ranking (CLR) algorithm.
    ClassifierChain
    Implementation of the Classifier Chain (CC) algorithm.
    EnsembleOfClassifierChains
    Implementation of the Ensemble of Classifier Chains(ECC) algorithm.
    EnsembleOfPrunedSets
    Implementation of the Ensemble of Pruned Sets (EPS) algorithm.
    IncludeLabelsClassifier
    A multilabel classifier based on the include labels transformation.
    LabelPowerset
    Implementation of the label powerset (LP) algorithm.
    LabelsetPruning
    Common functionality class for the PPT and PS algorithms.
    MultiClassLearner
    Class enabling a number of simple transformations of a multi-label task to a multi-class task (labels become class values).
    MultiLabelStacking
    Implementation of the (BR)^2 or Multi-Label stacking method.
    Pairwise
    Class implementing the Ranking by Pairwise Comparisons (RPC) algorithm.
    PPT
    Implementation of the Pruned Problem Transformation algorithm (PPT).
    PrunedSets
    Implementation of he Pruned Sets (PS) algorithm.
    TransformationBasedMultiLabelLearner
    Base class for multi-label learners that are based on data transformation
    TwoStageClassifierChainArchitecture
    Implementation of the Two Stage Classifier Chain Architecture (TSCCA) algorithm.
    TwoStagePrunedClassifierChainArchitecture
    Implementation of the Two Stage Pruned Classifier Chain Architecture (TSPCCA) algorithm.
    TwoStageVotingArchitecture
    Implementation of the Two Stage Voting Architecture (TSVA) algorithm.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PPT.Strategy
    strategies for processing infrequent labelsets
    PrunedSets.Strategy
    strategies for processing infrequent labelsets
